customProperties.armorEffects: When under 10% of your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +3 to your armor class.
customProperties.weaponEffects: When under 10% of your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +3 to damage rolls with this weapon.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: When under 10% of your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +3 to your armor class.
Weapon Effects: When under 10% of your maximum Hit Points, you gain a +3 to damage rolls with this weapon.
